name: The Homer Multitext project on github
tagline: Github web page for the Homer Miultitext project
body:
Public repositories for the Homer Multitext project on github:

- Central data archive 
- hmtdigital:  a servlet for the Homer Multitext project


## Other links

- The [Homer Multitext project web site][2]
- We rely on [the CITE architecture][1]

[2]: http://www.homermultitext.org

[1]: https://github.com/cite-architecture
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
